content.rendered:
STEWART & TATE CONSTRUCTION

Stewart & Tate Construction is a family owned and operated, full-service construction firm specializing in general building construction, site development, and specialized industrial construction. Headquartered in York, PA, the company provides preconstruction, construction, and post-construction services for projects throughout South Central Pennsylvania and Maryland.

Construction

By drawing upon experience gained from a diverse and broad portfolio of projects, Stewart & Tate Construction can build anything you need in central Pennsylvania and Maryland … from industrial, commercial, and warehouse projects to healthcare, senior living, and faith-based facilities.

An award-winning, licensed general contractor, we add value to our partnerships every step of the way through our business acumen, well-honed construction expertise, and deep reservoir of experience. The result? Repeat clients and relationships that last.

Commercial/ Retail

From convenience stores and big box strip centers to restaurants, branch bank buildings, and office buildings, our commercial resume is filled with outstanding projects from repeat customers. Whether you’re the owner or the developer, we strive to deliver absolute satisfaction that builds strong and lasting relationships.

Warehousing

From storage sheds to massive warehouses … from basic dry to cold storage … we have the expertise you’re looking for in a warehouse construction partner. Our resume includes tilt-up and precast building system projects and pre-engineered and conventional structures.

Industrial

Years of industrial construction experience make us uniquely suited to meet your industrial construction needs, from the smallest project to the construction of an entirely new manufacturing facility or warehouse. Our services range from tenant fit-out, finish work, and office enclosures to the construction of entire industrial plants. Further, with the specialized talents of our Industrial Services group, we offer a precise understanding of both the shell building and what goes on inside, adding real value to our partnership.

Faith-Based

We have become one of the faith-based community’s most trusted partners for construction projects, large and small. We have a complete portfolio of religious-affiliated projects, from churches to faith-based community centers, including small projects like office renovations and daycare facilities.

Healthcare

From in-hospital renovations and expansions to the construction of satellite medical facilities, Stewart & Tate Construction has the specialized expertise, certifications, and employee clearances you’re looking for in a healthcare construction partner. In addition, our knowledge and implementation of ICRA requirements make us especially valuable as health systems respond to rapid regulatory, technological, and demographic changes. Our portfolio includes projects in both Pennsylvania and Maryland, and we are ASHE (American Society for Healthcare Engineering) certified.

Education

The construction of a three-story addition and renovations to the existing school – all while the school is in session – is just one example of how we serve the education segment. These types of projects require tremendous coordination and scheduling expertise to ensure student safety and avoid interruption of the educational process. However, we have successfully navigated these challenges in projects of all sizes for clients ranging from charter schools to private universities in Pennsylvania and Maryland.

Senior Care/ Hospitality

At Stewart & Tate Construction, we understand that nothing is more important to senior living providers than your relationship with your residents. So our goal is to become a long-term partner in providing residents with the best facilities and a better living experience as they progress through your skilled continuum of care. We offer support in all aspects of construction, including modifications, additions, and new or replacement facilities. Plus, we are both Aging-in-Place Specialists and ASHE (American Society for Healthcare Engineering) certified.

Automotive

Having successfully renovated, expanded, and built dealerships for various automotive clients, Stewart & Tate Construction has become uniquely qualified to meet the challenging demands of this specialized segment of construction.

Given the brisk pace of the automotive industry, owners cannot afford facility downtime. Through direct experience, Stewart & Tate has developed the skills, knowledge, and best practices essential to minimize interruptions to your operations and successfully deliver projects of the highest quality. Our portfolio of work involving automotive facility construction encompasses many facets, such as interior showrooms, service garages, customer service areas, service bays, administrative offices, car wash facilities, and customer lounges.

ADDRESS

950 Smile Way
York, PA 17404

Capabilities

VISIT SITE CONTACT US
